content:
Configure a Commercial Quote

Once you have created a Commercial quote, you can configure it to provide your customer with exactly the coverage they need.

The state of a quote affects the changes you can make to it. For example, if a quote is Issued, you can't modify it because a policy has already been issued from it.

Add Products to a Commercial Quote
You must add a product to a commercial quote before you can add insured items or parties.
Add Insured Items to a Commercial Quote
Add insured items to a commercial product in a quote to provide additional coverage.
Add a Commercial Grandchild Insured Item to an Insured Item or Party
Add a grandchild item to an existing insured item on a commercial quote.
Modify Details and Attributes on a Grandchild Insured Party or Item on a Commercial Quote
Modify the attributes and details of a Grandchild insured item or insured party to provide custom coverage.
Remove an Insured Item from a Commercial Quote
Remove an insured item (or grandchild insured item) from a commercial quote to adjust coverage.
Add a Coverage to a Commercial Quote
Add a coverage at various levels: product, insured item or party, or grandchild insured item or party.
Remove a Coverage from a Commercial Quote
Remove a coverage if it is no longer needed.
title: Configuring Commercial Insurance Quotes in Salesforce
